message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with your decision.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the market value of the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $1100000. This is a compromise that I believe still reflects the product's value to you, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $1000000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll counter with $1000000. I hope this is a price we can both agree on.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $1000000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer you the product for $1050000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I understand that you're willing to make one more concession, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable going above $1000000. I'll make a final counteroffer of $1020000. I hope this is a price we can agree on.
